name: Spintales
description:
Spintales is a roguelite choose-your-own-adventure !

Your world has been plagued by the an unbridled thirst for gold.
Once again you set out to put an end to the curse.
Will you be able to stop it this time?

Features

Uncover magical secrets!
Enjoy horizontal and vertical deep character progression,
learn ancient secrets to improve your chances!
Powerfull loot!
Collect powerfull equipment and artifacts in an expansive yet easy to understand looting system!

Unique combat system!
Experience the thrills of combat
A risk-management, slot-based, semi-autobattler.
Gain gold and experience while playing, spend your earnings on hundreds of powerful upgrades!

Uncover a magical world and it's creatures!
Explore over 15 worlds, filled with over 200 enemies and horrifying bosses!

Easy to learn - hard to master!
The world is at it's end... only you may put a stop to it.

Endless replayability!
No 2 runs are ever the same, face various challenges as they come!
Allows for a very different game through each run you do!
Each run should take you between 15-45 minutes.
